attributes.action: Put Wilfried Bony on the new first class stamp.
attributes.additional_details: To add cultural diversity to British Stamps.
attributes.background: Create a new first class stamp, with a picture of Wilfried Bony on the front of it.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition as the design of Stamps is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

Stamp design is the responsibility of Royal Mail. You can find more information here:

https://www.royalmail.com/personal/stamps-collectibles-gifts/
